explanation: Uses wscript to run the built-in PubPrn.vbs in a way that proxies execution of a remote scriptlet. This abuses a native admin script under user context.
rationale_steps: From PowerShell, call wscript with PubPrn.vbs targeting the local system and a script: moniker URL.
WSH processes the remote .sct via PubPrn.vbs and executes the contained script.
This technique relies on trusted Windows scripts; monitoring should flag PubPrn.vbs with script: URIs.
